column4: Latest;Pailin: Suspicious villagers challenged two men on a motorcycle carrying a rather large sack at 1:30 pm on June 13
column7: the pair dropped the bag and drove off. Inside the sack was a calf weighing 40-50 kg
column8: which died (unclear whether before or after being put in the sack).------The area saw a spate of cow thefts in 2018
column9: and owners are warned to be vigilant. The cow corpse was collected with a tractor and returned to the owner.------Police are actively searching for the thieves. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/864693.html
